wikipedia_page.main: Simon Rea (born 20 September 1976) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League with Birmingham City, Peterborough United and Cambridge United. He also played for non-league clubs Kettering Town, Nuneaton Borough, Redditch United, Kidderminster Harriers, Corby Town and Leamington.Rea made 159 league appearances and played in another 22 national cup matches for Peterborough between 1999 and 2005.
